net.powermatcher.api

Interface Session


  • public interface Session
    Session defines the interface for a link between an AgentEndpoint with a MatcherEndpoint in a Powermatcher cluster.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect the AgentEndpoint from the MatcherEndpoint.
      java.lang.String getAgentId() 
      java.lang.String getClusterId() 
      MarketBasis getMarketBasis() 
      java.lang.String getMatcherId() 
      java.lang.String getSessionId() 
      void setMarketBasis(MarketBasis marketBasis)
      Sets the MarketBasis for this session.
      void updateBid(BidUpdate newBid)
      Passes the Bid sent by the AgentEndpoint to the MatcherEndpoint of this session.
      void updatePrice(PriceUpdate priceUpdate)
      Passes the PriceUpdate sent by the MatcherEndpoint to the AgentEndpoint of this Session.

    • Method Detail

      • getAgentId

        java.lang.String getAgentId()
        Returns:
        the agentId of the AgentEndpoint of this Session.

      • getMatcherId

        java.lang.String getMatcherId()
        Returns:
        the agentId of the MatcherEndpoint of this Session.

      • getClusterId

        java.lang.String getClusterId()
        Returns:
        the id of the cluster this Session is active in.

      • getSessionId

        java.lang.String getSessionId()
        Returns:
        the id of this Session instance.

      • getMarketBasis

        MarketBasis getMarketBasis()
        Returns:
        the MarketBasis used in this Session.

      • setMarketBasis

        void setMarketBasis(MarketBasis marketBasis)
        Sets the MarketBasis for this session. This should be set by the MatcherEndpoint when its MatcherEndpoint.connectToAgent(Session) method is called. This makes sure that the AgentEndpoint knows which MarketBasis is used for bidding.
        Parameters:
        marketBasis - the new marketBasis used in this Session.

      • updatePrice

        void updatePrice(PriceUpdate priceUpdate)
        Passes the PriceUpdate sent by the MatcherEndpoint to the AgentEndpoint of this Session. It calls AgentEndpoint.handlePriceUpdate(PriceUpdate).
        Parameters:
        priceUpdate - The PriceUpdate passed by the MatcherEndpoint of this Session.

      • updateBid

        void updateBid(BidUpdate newBid)
        Passes the Bid sent by the AgentEndpoint to the MatcherEndpoint of this session.
        Parameters:
        newBid - The Bid passed by the AgentEndpoint of this Session.
        See Also:
        MatcherEndpoint.handleBidUpdate(Session, BidUpdate)

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnect the AgentEndpoint from the MatcherEndpoint. This method should always call both the AgentEndpoint.matcherEndpointDisconnected(Session) and the MatcherEndpoint.agentEndpointDisconnected(Session) methods. This method can be called by any object, event the AgentEndpoint or MatcherEndpoint themselves.
